item.title: HyperSpy 1.3.1 has been released!
item.description:
We are pleased to announce the release of HyperSpy 1.3.1

This is a maintenance release. Follow the following links for details on all the bugs fixed and enhancements.

Starting with this version, the HyperSpy WinPython Bundle distribution is no longer released in sync with HyperSpy. For HyperSpy WinPython Bundle releases see https://github.com/hyperspy/hyperspy-bundle

item.title: New interactive demos
item.description: Interactive demos have been added to HyperSpy!

item.title: HyperSpy 1.3 has been released!
item.description:
We are pleased to announce the release of HyperSpy 1.3

This is a minor release that includes multiple new features, enhances and bug fixes. See the the changelist for details.

item.title: HyperSpy 1.2 has been released!
item.description:
We are pleased to announce the release of HyperSpy 1.2

This is a minor release that includes multiple new features, enhances and bug fixes. See the the changelist for details.

item.title: HyperSpy 1.1.2 has been released!
item.description:
We are pleased to announce the release of HyperSpy 1.1.2

This is a maintenance release. Follow the following links for details on all the bugs fixed and enhancements.

item.title: HyperSpy 1.1 has been released!
item.description: We are pleased to announce the release of HyperSpy 1.1

item.title: HyperSpy 1.0.1 has been released!
item.description: We are pleased to announce the release of HyperSpy 1.0.1

item.title: Scipy2016 HyperSpy talk
item.description: Watch online Tomas Ostaševičius presenting “HyperSpy: How to Easily Bend Multi-dimensional Data to your Analytical Will” at the SciPy2016 conference.

item.title: HyperSpy 1.0 has been released!
item.description: We are pleased to announce the release of HyperSpy 1.0.

item.title: New demos added
item.description: The existing demos have been updated and three new demos have been added.

item.title: HyperSpy 0.8.5 has been released!
item.description: We are pleased to announce the release of HyperSpy 0.8.5.

item.title: HyperSpy workshop at EMC2016
item.description: We are happy to announce a HyperSpy workshop at the 16th European Microscopy Congress (EMC 2016). The workshop will take place on the 27th of August 2016 in Lyon, France.

item.title: HyperSpy workshop at SCANDEM2016
item.description: We are happy to announce a HyperSpy workshop at the SCANDEM2016 conference. The workshop will take place on the 7th of June 2016 in Trondheim, Norway. There area only 20 places available. Registration to the conference is required to register to the workshop.

item.title: HyperSpy 0.8.3 and 0.8.4 have been released!
item.description: We are pleased to announce the release of HyperSpy 0.8.3 and 0.8.4.

item.title: HyperSpy 0.8.2 has been released!
item.description: We are proud to announce a new maitenance release of HyperSpy.

item.title: HyperSpy 0.8.1 has been released!
item.description: This is a maintenance release that fixes an issue with the Python installers. Those who have successfully installed v0.8.1 do not need to upgrade.

item.title: Citing HyperSpy
item.description: HyperSpy can now be cited using our brand new D.O.I. See how to cite HyperSpy or click on the DOI badge below for details.

item.title: HyperSpy Workshop @ Cambridge (UK), 13th of April 2015
item.description: Multi-dimensional data analysis with Python and HyperSpy Workshop. Registration and more information here.

item.title: HyperSpy 0.8 has been released!
item.description: We are proud to announce a new release of Hyperspy.

item.title: HyperSpy 0.7.3 has been released!
item.description: New maintenance release to solve a library compatibility issue.

item.title: HyperSpy 0.7.2 has been released!
item.description: We are proud to announce a new maintenance release of Hyperspy.

item.title: New demos section
item.description: The examples section in the HyperSpy website has been replaced by a new demos section.

item.title: HyperSpy 0.7.1 has been released!
item.description: We are proud to announce a new maintenance release of Hyperspy.

item.title: HyperSpy practical at the SuperSTEM Summer School
item.description: The 6th biennial SuperSTEM Summer School (4-7 July 2014, Daresbury UK) includes a HyperSpy practial.

item.title: HyperSpy training at the IMC2014
item.description: HyperSpy training at the IMC2014 on the 7th of September 2014 in Prague, Czech Republic.

item.title: HyperSpy talks and training at SHIRE2014
item.description: Two HyperSpy-related talks and a HyperSpy training @ SHIRE2014 on the 10-11 April 2014 in Sheffield, UK.

item.title: HyperSpy tutorial at the SFmu2013
item.description: A tutorial on analysis of multidimensional spectra using HyperSpy is available as part of the official program of SFMu 2013.
